replies.body: Same issue here. It said my client disconnected and I was hit with this same pop up about having to repatch my client. Now I lost that game be cause of a remake and I also have a 20 min low priority queue for the 4th time this month because of the leaverbuster. This is bullshit, lmao.

-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"
